---
## PR Review: feat/web-dashboard-shell

### Review Complete ✅

**Verdict: Approved**

I've reviewed the key files in this PR and found the implementation to be solid:

| Area | Status |
|------|--------|
| Code Quality | ✅ Clean, consistent patterns |
| Architecture | ✅ Proper separation of server/client code |
| Security | ✅ Token refresh, runtime validation, security headers |
| Error Handling | ✅ Graceful degradation, proper error boundaries |
| Discord API | ✅ Rate limiting, pagination, discriminated results |
| Docker | ✅ Multi-stage build, non-root user, healthcheck |

**Files Reviewed:**
- `web/src/lib/auth.ts` - Comprehensive auth with runtime validation
- `web/src/lib/discord.server.ts` - Rate limiting, pagination, defensive error handling
- `web/src/lib/discord.ts` - Clean CDN utilities
- `web/src/proxy.ts` - Proper token error handling and redirects
- `web/src/components/error-card.tsx` - Clean shared component
- `web/next.config.ts` - Security headers configured
- `web/Dockerfile` - Proper production setup

No issues found. Previous review comments have been addressed.

--
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/60#issuecomment-3905973261
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

Message ID: <BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/60/c3905973261@github.com>

INSTRUCTIONS: Evaluate this email. If important (login codes, billing, payments, action required, replies to Bill, package tracking), DM Bill using: message action=send channel=discord target=user:191633014441115648 message="brief summary". If not important (marketing, newsletters, spam, test emails from himself, Google security alerts about new sign-ins/devices, GitHub PR comments/reviews/CI notifications), reply NO_REPLY. SKIP all Google Security Alert emails. SKIP all GitHub notification emails about PR comments, reviews, code review requests, CI/CD status, and issue comments. Auto-track any package tracking numbers with 17TRACK.
<<<END_EXTERNAL_UNTRUSTED_CONTENT>>>
